actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to provide for joint action by the executive and legislative branches to limit outlays from budget authority for the fiscal year.

summary.text: Provides that, within 40 days after enactment of this Act, the President shall submit to Congress recommendations or proposals for changes in existing law which are sufficient to limit budget outlays of the United States Government during fiscal year 1975 to $300,000,000,000.

titles.title: A bill to provide for joint action by the executive and legislative branches to limit outlays from budget authority for the fiscal year.
